abstract: The chief executive of the Potash Corporation described BHP Billiton’s $130-a-share hostile bid as “non-starter” even though a competing offer has yet to emerge.
snippet: The chief executive of the Potash Corporation described BHP Billiton’s $130-a-share hostile bid as “non-starter” even though a competing offer has yet to emerge.
lead_paragraph: The chief executive of the Potash Corporation went on the offensive against its unwanted suitor on Thursday, confidently describing BHP Billiton‘s $130-a-share hostile bid as “non-starter” even though a competing offer has yet to emerge.

headline.main: Potash Scoffs at BHP, While Sinochem Waits

abstract: Rio Tinto is interested in possible bolt-on acquisitions in a range of sectors, including potash, an executive said on Thursday, Reuters reported.
snippet: Rio Tinto is interested in possible bolt-on acquisitions in a range of sectors, including potash, an executive said on Thursday, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: The mining company Rio Tinto is interested in possible bolt-on acquisitions in a range of sectors, including potash, an executive said on Thursday, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Rio Tinto Is Said to Be Interested in Potash Sector
